title: Ed Thorgersen's sports review: playtime in Hawaii
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Truman Talley
brief_description: Cinemagazine showing various outdoor recreation in Hawaii: net fishing from the rocky shores; mud sliding; arm wrestling; gymnastics; rugby; horseback riding along Honolulu’s shoreline; sailing; surfing; outrigger canoes.
